valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Tue 11 Nov 2025 to 06:00 (UTC) on Wed 12 Nov 2025
general_synopsis: Low Faeroes 991 losing its identity by midnight tonight. Atlantic low expected 250 miles west of Sole 981 by same time. New low expected Malin 987
